insights.title: Platform Dominance in Tour Industry
insights.insight: Reddit is the most discussed platform among tour operators
insights.action: Focus your content strategy on this platform for maximum impact

insights.title: Content Preference Analysis
insights.data: community content represents 100% of all content
insights.insight: Tour operators prefer this type of content for problem-solving
insights.action: Create more content in this format to better serve your audience

insights.insight: The tour operator industry is very active with new content
insights.action: Stay current with industry trends and respond quickly to changes
